metadata.inclusion: Press the Function button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Smoke Detector will emit a 2-tone beep and the LED will turn on for ~2 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Smoke Detector will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Function Button for 10 seconds.
